items.content_html: Password Validator is a lightweight web tool built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to instantly assess and guide users in creating strong and secure passwords. Through real-time feedback, users receive guidance on password strength, reinforcing best practices for enhanced online security.

Through real-time feedback, users receive guidance on password strength, reinforcing best practices for enhanced online security.
